name: Lieutenant Sarah Brooks
backstory: Lieutenant Brooks flies Coast Guard rescue helicopters, saving lives in some of the most challenging conditions imaginable. From hurricane evacuations to mountain rescues, her 8 years of experience have involved hundreds of life-saving missions. Her expertise in helicopter operations and emergency procedures is unmatched.
teaching_style: High-intensity training focused on emergency procedures and helicopter-specific operations. Emphasizes mission planning, crew coordination, and making life-or-death decisions under pressure.
signature_phrases: In search and rescue, every second counts
Helicopter flying is about managing energy and understanding your limits
We train for the worst day of someone else's life
